original_text: Every valley shall be filled, and every mountain and hill shall be brought low; and the crooked shall be made straight, and the rough ways shall be made smooth;
korean_text: 모든 골짜기가 메워지고 모든 산과 작은 산이 낮아지고 굽은 것이 곧아지고 험한 길이 평탄하여질 것이요

sentences.original_text: and every mountain and hill shall be brought low;
and the crooked shall be made straight,
and the rough ways shall be made smooth;
